class_notes:
(Same as CS 329 1, LING 329 1)
QTM/Ling 329 cannot count toward the CS major unless students complete both majors.
course_description: This course will focus on the analysis of syntactic and semantic structures, ontologies and taxonomies, distributional semantics and discourse, as well as their applications in computational linguistics. Assignments will include advanced statistical analyses.
prerequisites: QTM 220 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
